languages.text: "Из-за его удаленности на Футфоле расцвели собственные порядки и правила. Многие товары, которые там можно достать, в центральных секторах Империума считаются ересью, достаточной для немедленной казни. К тому же Футфол — вотчина Вольных Торговцев, которые игнорируют определенные законы Империума в силу обладания Патентом".

traits.locale_text: "Из-за стратегической важности Футфола жителям всегда позволялись некоторые вольности. Многие товары, которые там можно достать, в других секторах Империума считались бы контрабандой. К тому же Футфол — вотчина Вольных Торговцев. Это придает ему веса и защищает от слишком пристального внимания Администратума и Арбитров".

languages.text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."
languages.original_text: "Из-за его удаленности на Футфоле расцвели собственные порядки и правила. Многие товары, которые там можно достать, в центральных секторах Империума считаются ересью, достаточной для немедленной казни. К тому же Футфол — вотчина Вольных Торговцев, которые игнорируют определенные законы Империума в силу обладания Патентом".

traits.locale_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who disregard certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

"Due to Footfall's strategic importance, its denizens have always enjoyed a certain leniency. Many of the goods that can be procured at the station would be considered contraband in other sectors of the Imperium. Besides, Footfall is a Rogue Trader estate. It grants it heft and protects it from close attention of the Administratum and the Arbitrators."

"Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who disregard certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

"Due to Footfall's strategic importance, its denizens have always enjoyed certain license in their actions. Many of the goods that can be procured on the station would be considered contraband in other sectors of the Imperium. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders. This grants it clout and shields it from the scrutiny of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} and the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusArbites}Arbites{/g}."

"Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who disregard certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

"Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

languages.text: «Dada la remota ubicación de Paso, ha desarrollado costumbres y normas propias. Muchos de los productos que se pueden obtener allí se considerarían una muestra suficiente de herejía como para conllevar la ejecución inmediata en el corazón del Imperium. Por si fuera poco, Paso es dominio de los Comerciantes Independientes, cuyas patentes les permiten infringir algunas leyes imperiales».
languages.original_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

traits.locale_text: «Dada la remota ubicación de Paso, ha desarrollado costumbres y normas propias. Muchos de los productos que se pueden obtener allí se considerarían una muestra suficiente de herejía como para conllevar la ejecución inmediata en el corazón del Imperium. Por si fuera poco, Paso es dominio de los Comerciantes Independientes, cuyas patentes les permiten infringir algunas leyes imperiales».

languages.text: “由于落脚港地理位置偏远，它已经形成了它自己的规矩与习俗。这里的很多货物，如果放在帝国中心进行售卖的话，那些商贩恐怕会被当做异端分子即刻处决。此外，落脚港还是行商浪人的领地。他们凭借各自的贸易授状，拥有着凌驾于部分帝国法律之上的特权。”
languages.original_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

traits.locale_text: “由于落脚港地理位置偏远，它已经形成了它自己的规矩与习俗。这里的很多货物，如果放在帝国中心进行售卖的话，那些商贩恐怕会被当做异端分子即刻处决。此外，落脚港还是行商浪人的领地。他们凭借各自的贸易许可证，拥有着凌驾于部分帝国法律之上的特权。”

languages.text: 「フットフォールは辺鄙な場所にあるため、独自の規則と慣習が育っているのです。そこで調達できる商品の多くは帝国の中心では異端とみなされていて、略式処刑が正当化されるほどです。そのうえフットフォールは自由開拓者の庭で、彼らは所有する令状で特定の帝国法を潜り抜けています」
languages.original_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールは辺鄙な場所にあるため、独自の規則と慣習が育っているのです。そこで調達できる商品の多くは帝国の中心では異端とみなされていて、略式処刑が正当化されるほどです。そのうえフットフォールは自由開拓者の庭で、彼らは所有する令状で特定の帝国法を潜り抜けています」

languages.text: "Aufgrund seiner Abgelegenheit hat Footfall eigene Regeln und Gebräuche entwickelt. Viele der dort erhältlichen Waren würden im Herz des Imperiums als Ketzerei gelten, die mit Hinrichtungen ohne Prozess geahndet wird. Zudem ist Footfall das Reich der Freihändler, die bestimmte imperiale Gesetze durch ihren Handelsbrief umgehen."
languages.original_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

traits.locale_text: "Aufgrund seiner Abgelegenheit hat Footfall eigene Regeln und Gebräuche entwickelt. Viele der dort erhältlichen Waren würden im Herz des Imperiums als Ketzerei gelten, die mit Hinrichtungen ohne Prozess geahndet wird. Zudem ist Footfall das Reich der Freihändler, die bestimmte imperiale Gesetze durch ihren Handelsbrief umgehen."

languages.text: « En raison de son isolement, Castel a mis en place ses propres règles et coutumes. La plupart des marchandises que l'on peut s'y procurer seraient considérées comme hérétiques au cœur de l'Imperium, au point que leur possession serait punie par une exécution sommaire. De plus, Castel est le domaine des libres-marchands, qui transcendent certaines lois impériales en vertu de leur lettre de marque. »
languages.original_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

traits.locale_text: « En raison de son isolement, Castel a mis en place ses propres règles et coutumes. La plupart des marchandises que l'on peut s'y procurer seraient considérées comme hérétiques au cœur de l'Imperium, au point que leur possession serait punie par une exécution sommaire. De plus, Castel est le domaine des libres-marchands, qui transcendent certaines lois impériales en vertu de leur lettre de marque. »

languages.text: "Uzaklığı nedeniyle Binliman, kendi kurallarını ve geleneklerini geliştirmiştir. Oradan temin edilen birçok ürün, İmparatorluk'un merkezinde kâfirlik olarak nitelendirilir ve insanı yargısız idama götürür. Ayrıca Binliman, taşıdıkları Ruhsatname sayesinde belirli İmparatorluk kanunlarından azade olan Hür Tacirlerin de diyarıdır."
languages.original_text: "Due to Footfall's remoteness, it has developed its own rules and customs. Many of the goods that can be procured there would be considered heresy in the heart of the Imperium, enough to warrant summary execution. Moreover, Footfall is the domain of the Rogue Traders, who transcend certain Imperial laws by virtue of the Warrant they bear."

traits.locale_text: "Uzaklığı nedeniyle Binliman, kendi kurallarını ve geleneklerini kendi geliştirmiştir. Burada üretilen birçok ürün, İmparatorluk'un merkezinde kâfirlik olarak değerlendirilebilir ve yargısız infaza yol açabilir. Ayrıca Binliman, taşıdıkları Ruhsatname sayesinde belli İmparatorluk kanunlarından azade olan Hür Tacirlerin de diyarıdır."
